$WHERE_OPTION$

SELECT A.SEQ_NO, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.DEL_YN, A.VALID_DT, A.IS_POPUP, A.GAME_TYPE, A.ANN_TYPE, A.USER_ID, A.REG_ID, A.REG_DT, A.MOD_DT, B.NAME AS ANN_TYPE_NM, C.USER_NIC FROM BOARD_ANN A LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_CODE B ON ( B.PCODE = 'A12' AND B.CODE = A.ANN_TYPE ) LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_MST C ON ( A.USER_ID = C.USER_ID ) WHERE SEQ_NO = #SEQ_NO#
sqlMap.statement: INSERT INTO BOARD_ANN( TITLE, CONTENT, DEL_YN, VALID_DT, IS_POPUP, GAME_TYPE, ANN_TYPE, USER_ID, REG_ID, REG_DT, MOD_DT ) VALUES (#TITLE#, #CONTENT#, #DEL_YN#, #VALID_DT#, #IS_POPUP#, #GAME_TYPE#, #ANN_TYPE#, #USER_ID#, #REG_ID#, NOW() , NOW() )

UPDATE BOARD_ANN SET TITLE=#TITLE#, CONTENT=#CONTENT#, DEL_YN=#DEL_YN#, VALID_DT=#VALID_DT#, IS_POPUP=#IS_POPUP#, GAME_TYPE=#GAME_TYPE#, ANN_TYPE=#ANN_TYPE#, USER_ID=#USER_ID#, REG_ID=#REG_ID#, MOD_DT=NOW() WHERE SEQ_NO = #SEQ_NO#
